amendment.description: To provide for expedited action in bid protests conducted under OMB Circular A-76.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1345 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1345 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S12778-12791, S12792-12793; text: CR S12778) To provide for expedited action in bid protests conducted under OMB Circular A-76.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1345 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1345 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Collins.
